content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Mary Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Hello Mary, thank you for visiting my apartment. Based on your interest and qualifications, I would like to propose a rental price of €700 per month. This price includes all utilities and maintenance costs, as well as the security deposit of €1000. I believe this is a fair and reasonable price for a 25 square meter apartment in the heart of Munich. What do you think about this proposal?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of €700 per month. Thank you.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Great to hear that you agree to the rental price of €700 per month. I am glad that we could reach an agreement that is mutually beneficial. I will provide you with a contract and other necessary documents for you to review and sign. Do you have any questions or concerns before we proceed?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
No, I have no questions or concerns. Thank you.
Can I pay in cash or by bank transfer?

Also, do you have any references that I can ask about?

Thanks again.

Mary Smith
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content:
Yes, you can pay the rental price in cash or by bank transfer. I prefer bank transfer as it is more convenient and secure. I will provide you with the necessary information for you to make the payment.

As for references, I have had several previous tenants who can vouch for my property management skills and professionalism. I can provide you with their contact information if you would like to speak with them. Please let me know if you need any further information or assistance.
name: Heinrich Heine
